channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Street Drain Blocked, 6th December
item.description:
The drain in the road is blocked. There are two drains on this side of the street, one half way down the road and the other at the corner outside number 12 and both are blocked.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 6, Queens Retreat, Alstone, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Water pouring down the lane from a hole in the road, 6th December
item.description:
Bushcombe Lane Woodmancote directly outside West Ridge. A significant amount of water is pouring from the hole and flooding the lane. It has increased dramatically over the last few days but has been there for weeks (previously reported) If temperatures drop this will be extremely dangerous!!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bushcombe Lane, Woodmancote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: No rain in 24 hours - water has increased or remained the same

item.title: Footpath diverted + obstructed by building materials, 6th December
item.description:
Foot path to rear of Mead Road has been encroached on by brick wall being built beyond garden boundary. Footpath is obstructed by discarded building debris - bricks, cement, bottles, planks - surface is churned up and dangerous

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Evelyn Close, Charlton Kings, Cheltenham
